message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive breadth in mid/small caps. Clean breakouts in GMRAIRPORT (>105.5) and LTF (>302). PSU rail/infrastructure stayed firm (RVNL, NBCC, HUDCO). Exchanges/Depositories reclaimed key levels (BSE >2860, CDSL >1605). Capital goods improved (BHEL cleared 287–292 band; BEL >414). Metals mixed (SAIL still sub-145; HindCopper testing 330). We remain all-cash; plan to build 3–5 small positions on Monday. Only if momentum runs away, use emergency buys tomorrow with tight stops.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Breakout buy (continuation)", "reason": "Decisive breakout above 105.5 with strong volume; room toward 111/115 if holds >103–104.", "price": 106.76},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Breakout buy", "reason": "Tight base resolved above 302; strong close and volume; momentum intact while >297/291.", "price": 307.60},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Momentum buy on strength", "reason": "Strong close near HOD; continuation trigger >329.9 can open 338/345. Risk reference ~311.", "price": 323.60},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Buy on dips/strength", "reason": "Cleared 287–292 supply; buy pullbacks to 285–288 or strength >292 with stop ~282/276.", "price": 289.70},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Breakout-retest buy", "reason": "Held above 117.5 area; add on strength >119 or dips 114–115 with stop ~111.5.", "price": 118.51},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "signal": "Trend continuation buy", "reason": "Higher-highs with volume; buy near 236–239 or add >235→240 strength; stop ~221.", "price": 239.17},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Reclaim buy", "reason": "Reclaimed >1605; momentum builds >1665–1670; cut if slips <1575.", "price": 1619.90},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Reclaim/continuation buy", "reason": "Closed back above 2860/2879; improved structure while >2795–2800.", "price": 2886.70},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Continuation buy", "reason": "Recovered >414; follow-through above 418/432 strengthens trend; stop ~403.", "price": 415.30},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling; sustained move >415 with volume can start next leg; risk ~392.", "price": 405.60},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Testing resistance; >330 sustain targets 335–340; risk ~312.", "price": 329.10},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Two-sided plan", "reason": "Accumulate 100–102 with stop ~96 or buy strength only above 105.", "price": 101.95},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Avoid until breakout", "reason": "Bounce but still below key 145–146 resistance; strength-only entry.", "price": 136.92},
    {"symbol": "KPITTECH", "signal": "Breakout continuation (small size)", "reason": "Strong close from flag; volatile—use tight stop under 1168.", "price": 1194.90}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Don’t miss fresh breakout follow-through if momentum persists tomorrow.", "quantity": 50, "price": "Buy-Stop 107.20, SL 101.90"},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Breakout-retest; strength through 119 confirms continuation.", "quantity": 60, "price": "Buy-Stop 119.00, SL 111.50"},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Strong uptrend; buy near prior breakout zone with defined risk.", "quantity": 30, "price": "Limit 236.00–239.50, SL 221.00"},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Dip-accumulate within range; risk well-defined ahead of 105 breakout attempt.", "quantity": 40, "price": "Limit 100.50–102.00, SL 96.00"},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Fresh breakout; small starter in case of immediate continuation.", "quantity": 10, "price": "Buy-Stop 309.00, SL 291.00"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {"cash": 27267.00, "total_value": 27267.00, "holdings_count": 0, "holdings": []},
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU rails/infrastructure: RVNL closed strong; clean trigger >329.9. IRCON steady 160–162; pace above 165. NBCC held breakout; HUDCO trending.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE reclaimed 2860/2879; CDSL reclaimed >1605; MCX extended—prefer dips only.",
    "Airports: GMRAIRPORT confirmed breakout >105.5 on strong volume; constructive for continuation.",
    "Capital goods/cables: BHEL cleared 287–292; BEL >414 improves odds; KEI/Polycab firm but size small and use strength-only entries.",
    "Metals: SAIL bounce but below 145 cap; HindCopper flirting with 330 breakout—needs follow-through.",
    "Banks/NBFC: LTF breakout >302; PSU banks consolidating (IDBI 100–105, IOB/CENTRALBK range-bound).",
    "Telecom towers: IndusTower coiling; sustained >415 needed for next leg; Bharti Hexacom steady, lighter volumes.",
    "Renewables/Power: NTPCGREEN range 94–96; InoxWind choppy; Waaree Ener steady.",
    "Pharma: Lupin firm; Biocon improved to ~398; Laurus stable >970; Zydus constructive.",
    "IT/Services: KPITTECH strong close; COFORGE/MPHASIS constructive—volatility warrants small sizing.",
    "Discretionary/FMCG: Voltas reclaimed 1380s; Trent firm; Jubilant Food needs >619 for momentum; VBL strong continuation.",
    "Execution: If tomorrow gaps >0.7%, let first 20–30 minutes set range; prioritize pullback entries to marked zones with predefined stops; keep position sizes small given 27k capital."
  ]
}
